arts.ttl: Zanetti reflects on Verona’s resurgence: “We must be worthy of this club”
arts.sum: Hellas Verona coach Paolo Zanetti expressed his relief and satisfaction following a crucial victory against Parma, which has revitalized the team’s fortunes and helped secure his position as head coach. The win marked an important step for Verona, who had been struggling in recent weeks. In his post-match comments, Zanetti shared his thoughts on the week leading up to the match. “There are many things I don’t want to discuss right now. What matters is the pride we felt coming together to weather this storm. arts.ttl: Parma vs. Verona, a battle at the bottom
arts.sum: Parma are unbeaten in seven of the nine home games against Hellas Verona in Serie A, thanks to four victories (the last one on 4 October 2020, in the most recent match at the Tardini stadium in the competition between the two teams) and three draws. Among the teams that did not draw any of their first 15 games in a Serie A season in the three points for a win era, Hellas Verona are the one that have won the fewest points, just 12.
